name: Cinnamon Sugar Butter Cookies II
author: DARBYANNE
summary: This recipe is meant to mimic a Mrs. Fields cookie - for those times you can't get to the mall cookie shop!
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Combine the 3 tablespoons white sugar and the cinnamon in a small bowl and set aside
Blend dark brown sugar and white sugar in a large bowl with mixer on medium speed
Add butter and blend until grainy
Add eggs and vanilla extract, mixing until light and fluffy
Whisk flour, baking soda and salt together in a separate bowl
Add to sugar mixture, mixing at low speed just long enough to combine
Overmixing makes tough cookies! Roll dough  into 1inch balls, then roll each ball into cinnamon-sugar to coat
Place cookies on ungreased cookie sheets and bake at 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) for 18 to 20 minutes
Remove from sheets and let cool on racks
